00186 inline unsigned char *SystemsBiologyWorkbench::DataBlockWriter::createConnectMessage(
00187         const char *sessionKey, const char *name,
00188         SystemsBiologyWorkbench::Integer &length)
00189 {
00190         sbwDataBlockWriter writer(4 + strlen(sessionKey) + strlen(name));
00191 
00192         writer.packWithoutType(sessionKey);
00193         writer.packWithoutType(name);
00194 
00195         return writer.getDataCopy(length);
00196 }
00197 
00204 inline unsigned char *SystemsBiologyWorkbench::DataBlockWriter::createDisconnectMessage(
00205         SystemsBiologyWorkbench::Integer &length)
00206 {
00207         sbwDataBlockWriter writer(4);
00208         writer.packWithoutType(SBWRPC::disconnectMessage);
00209 
00210         return writer.getDataCopy(length);
00211 }
00212 
00223 inline unsigned char *SystemsBiologyWorkbench::DataBlockWriter::createException(
00224         SystemsBiologyWorkbench::Integer moduleTo,
00225         SystemsBiologyWorkbench::Integer messageId,
00226         unsigned char type,
00227         const char *message,
00228         const char *detailedMessage,
00229         SystemsBiologyWorkbench::Integer &length)
00230 {
00231         sbwDataBlockWriter writer ;
00232         SystemsBiologyWorkbench::Integer size = 24 + strlen(message) + strlen(detailedMessage);
00233         
00234         writer.packWithoutType(size); // no terminator
00235         writer.packWithoutType(moduleTo);
00236         writer.packWithoutType((unsigned char)SBWExceptionCode);
00237         writer.packWithoutType(messageId);
00238         writer.packWithoutType(type);
00239         writer.add(message);
00240         writer.add(detailedMessage);
00241 
00242         unsigned char *result = writer.getDataCopy(length);
00243 
00244         assert(length == size);
00245 
00246         return result ;
00247 }
